message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.NI. 

The paper discusses the optimization of redundancy schemes in distributed storage systems, which falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The analysis of storage and communication costs involves information theory (cs.IT) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The consideration of trade-offs between data reliability and overheads involves system engineering (cs.SY).
